_comment: Created by NCODowd on 07/07/2016 12:51:39 using v2.7
title: What are patients' overall experiences of their GP surgeries?
analysis_commentary: The majority of respondents to the GP patient survey have said overall their experiences of their GP surgeries were good: 85% of patients said their experiences were either very or fairly good in 2014/2015 although there has been a slight year on year decrease since 2011/12. This decrease of 3.5 percentage points translates to almost 178,000 patients.
